preHtmlTag.name: HTML tag pre heading
preHtmlTag.description: The HTML tag to use for the pre heading. Defaults to `p`.

colorPre.name: Pre Heading color
colorPre.description: A Tailwind CSS class describing the color of the pre-heading text. Defaults to `text-secondary`.

preHeadingClasses.name: Pre Heading classes
preHeadingClasses.description: Any additional classes to add to the pre heading.

preTextTransform.name: Text transform
preTextTransform.description: The text transform to apply to the pre heading. Defaults to `none`.

htmlTag.name: HTML tag
htmlTag.description: The HTML tag to use for the heading. Defaults to `h2`.

size.name: Size
size.description: The size of the heading. Defaults to `large`.

headingClasses.name: Heading classes
headingClasses.description: Any additional classes to add to the heading.

color.name: Color
color.description: A Tailwind CSS class describing the color of the heading text. Defaults to `text-black`.

textTransform.name: Text transform
textTransform.description: The text transform to apply to the heading text. Defaults to `none`.

align.name: Align
align.description: The alignment of the heading. Defaults to `left`.

wrapperClasses.name: Wrapper Classes
wrapperClasses.description: Any additional classes to add to the heading and pre heading wrapper element.
